articles.title: Fahim Ahmed
articles.contents:
About Me
My name’s Fahim Ahmed. I’m an incoming University of Waterloo student, passionate about computer science and finance.
About the Project
What investments would have made you bank if you invested in them last year?  To answer this question, I took a look at a Kaggle dataset web scraped from Yahoo Finance, containing data on over a thousand Exchange Traded Funds (ETF). My project, Investment Analysis of Exchange Traded Funds (ETF), analyzes which managers created the highest returning funds, what sector had the highest returns, and what level of risk resulted in the most returns.

articles.title: ETFs
articles.contents:
What ETF manager would provide the highest returns?



Additional Finding



A fund’s yield (the income generated to investors through interest and dividends) has a negative correlation with returns. This is understandable, as often times a company the fund is invested in would offer dividends to make up for the lack of returns.









In the shorterm many sectors were less than or near 0% returns. A few (most notably, the technology sector) surpassed the benchmark of the S&P 500, which tracks the performance of the top 500 companies.



In the longterm most sectors had positive returns, with the exception being the Energy sector. However, compared to the average returns of the S&P 500 (~10%), most sectors lagged behind with the exception being the technology sector. This shows that most ETFs often fail to meet the returns of the S&P 500, and that it is often a good idea to research about the S&P 500.









Overall, the investments that have best performed in the past year were growth focused investments in the technology sector. Due to the pandemic, there was immense growth in the technology sector during the past year as people moved to a digital environment. However, the technology sector still outperformed the rest of the sectors during the past 5 years.
Historical returns do not guarantee future returns.

articles.title: Exchange Traded Fund (ETF) Investment Analysis
articles.description:
In this website, I will be analysing ETFs.
Project dataset: https://www.kaggle.com/stefanoleone992/mutual-funds-and-etfs
The analysis can be found in the Analysis tab.
